ne12:1.4: Ye cassa micchaditthipaccaya uppajjeyyum aneke papaka akusala dhamma, te cassa nijjinna honti.
ne12:1.5: Sammaditthipaccaya cassa aneke kusala dhamma sambhavanti, te cassa bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
ne12:1.7: Ye cassa micchasankappapaccaya uppajjeyyum aneke papaka akusala dhamma, te cassa nijjinna honti.
ne12:1.8: Sammasankappapaccaya cassa aneke kusala dhamma sambhavanti.
ne12:1.10: Evam sammavacassa sammakammantassa sammaajivassa sammavayamassa sammasatissa sammasamadhissa sammavimuttassa sammavimuttinanadassanassa purisapuggalassa micchavimuttinanadassanam nijjinnam bhavati.
ne12:1.11: Ye cassa micchavimuttinanadassanapaccaya uppajjeyyum aneke papaka akusala dhamma, te cassa nijjinna honti.
ne12:1.12: Sammavimuttinanadassanapaccaya cassa aneke kusala dhamma sambhavanti, te cassa bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
ne12:2.1: Yassa va panatipata pativiratassa panatipato pahino hoti.
ne12:3.1: Ye ca kho keci ariyam atthangikam maggam garahanti, nesam sanditthika sahadhammika garayha vadanuvada agacchanti.
ne12:3.3: Tena hi ye micchaditthika, tesam bhavantanam pujja ca pasamsa ca.
ne12:3.4: Evam sammasankappam sammavacam sammakammantam sammaajivam sammavayamam sammasatim sammasamadhim sammavimuttim sammavimuttinanadassananca te bhavanto dhammam garahanti.
ne12:3.5: Tena hi ye micchavimuttinanadassana, tesam bhavantanam pujja ca pasamsa ca.
ne12:4.1: Ye ca kho keci evamahamsu “bhunjitabba kama, paribhunjitabba kama, asevitabba kama, nisevitabba kama, bhavayitabba kama, bahulikatabba kama”ti.
ne12:5.1: Ye va pana keci evamahamsu “attakilamathanuyogo dhammo”ti.
ne12:5.3: Ye ca kho keci evamahamsu “dukkho dhammo”ti.
ne12:5.5: Yatha va pana bhikkhuno sabbasankharesu asubhanupassino viharato subhasanna pahiyanti.
ne12:5.9: Yam yam va pana dhammam rocayati va upagacchati va, tassa tassa dhammassa yo patipakkho, svassa anitthato ajjhapanno bhavati.
